nodes.text: The Republic Treasury was an organization in the Galactic Republic that was tasked with overseeing the government's economic system, including the printing of Republic credits. The Treasury was a vast agency of numerous bureaus and offices whose agents were responsible for investigating tax fraud, currency manipulation, and counterfeiting. It also had worked long in conjunction with major banking organizations, such as the Bank of the Core and the InterGalactic Banking Clan, to hold credit reserves, which would ensure currency stability.

The Republic Treasury was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Rise of the Separatists, a 2019 supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' series of Star Wars Roleplaying products. The Republic Treasury was originally mentioned in the Star Wars Legends continuity in Darth Maul: Shadow Hunter, a 2001 novel authored by Michael Reaves. The Treasury later made its first appearance in Republic Commando: Triple Zero, a 2006 novel authored by Karen Traviss.
